flavorText: "The air is sweet with the taste of your fear."

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Luft ist süß vom Geschmack deiner Furcht."
foreignData.name: Yuan-Ti Giftklinge
foreignData.text:
Todesberührung
Immer wenn die Yuan-Ti Giftklinge einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, wage dich ins Gewölbe. (Betritt den ersten Raum oder rücke in den nächsten Raum vor.)

foreignData.flavorText: "El aire está dulce por el sabor de tu miedo".
foreignData.name: Hojacolmillo yuan-ti
foreignData.text:
Toque mortal.
Siempre que la Hojacolmillo yuan-ti haga daño de combate a un jugador, adéntrate en la mazmorra. (Entra en la primera sala o avanza a la siguiente.)

foreignData.flavorText: « L'odeur douceâtre de ta peur emplit l'air. »
foreignData.name: Lame-croc yuan-ti
foreignData.text:
Contact mortel
À chaque fois que le Lame-croc yuan-ti inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, aventurez-vous dans le donjon. (Entrez dans la première pièce ou avancez jusqu'à la pièce suivante.)

foreignData.flavorText: "L'aria è colma del dolce sapore della tua paura."
foreignData.name: Yuan-Ti Zanna-Lama
foreignData.text:
Tocco letale
Ogniqualvolta la Yuan-Ti Zanna-Lama infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, esplora il dungeon. (Entra nella prima stanza o avanza a quella successiva.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「お前の恐怖が漂う空気が美味しい。」
foreignData.name: ユアンティの毒牙刃
foreignData.text:
接死
ユアンティの毒牙刃がプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、ダンジョン探索をする。（ダンジョン探索をするとは、最初の部屋へ入るか、次の部屋へ進むことである。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 蛇・ならず者

foreignData.flavorText: "네 공포의 맛이 가득찬 공기가 달콤하게 느껴지는군."
foreignData.name: 유안 티 송곳니칼날
foreignData.text:
치명타
유안 티 송곳니칼날이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 던전에 진입한다. (첫 번째 방에 들어가거나 다음 방으로 전진한다.)

foreignData.flavorText: "O ar fica doce com o sabor do seu medo."
foreignData.name: Presalâmina Yuan-Ti
foreignData.text:
Toque mortífero
Toda vez que Presalâmina Yuan-Ti causar dano de combate a um jogador, aventure-se na masmorra. (Entre na primeira sala ou prossiga para a próxima.)

foreignData.name: Клинок-Зуб Юань-Ти
foreignData.text:
Смертельное касание
Каждый раз, когда Клинок-Зуб Юань-Ти наносит боевые повреждения игроку, углубитесь в подземелье. (Войдите в первую комнату или перейдите в следующую комнату.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「空气因你的恐惧变得更甜美。」
foreignData.name: 蛇人毒刃手
foreignData.text:
死触
每当蛇人毒刃手对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，深入地城。（进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

foreignData.flavorText: 「空氣因你的恐懼變得更甜美。」
foreignData.name: 蛇人毒刃手
foreignData.text:
死觸
每當蛇人毒刃手對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，深入地城。（進入第一個房間，或前進至下一個房間。）

name: Yuan-Ti Fang-Blade
originalText:
Deathtouch
Whenever Yuan-Ti Fang-Blade deals combat damage to a player, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

rulings.text: To venture into the dungeon, a player moves their venture marker into the next room of the dungeon they are currently in. If they aren't currently in a dungeon, that player instead chooses a dungeon card from outside the game, puts it into the command zone, and moves their venture marker onto the first room.
Moving into a dungeon room will cause its room ability to trigger.
Once you resolve the last room ability of a dungeon, that dungeon is now completed and is removed from the game.
A player may only have one dungeon in the command zone at a time.
The player venturing into the dungeon chooses which dungeon they will venture into. They may choose a dungeon that they have already completed this game.
Dungeon cards are not part of a player's deck or sideboard. In both constructed and limited formats, players can use any dungeon card when they venture into the dungeon.
You can only move forward (well, downward) in a dungeon, never backwards or sideways.
Dungeons are removed from the game as a state-based action.
If you somehow venture into the dungeon while a room's ability is on the stack, you will continue on in the dungeon. If you're already in the last room, complete that dungeon and start a new one.

Choosing the dungeon or room to venture into is part of resolving the venture into the dungeon keyword action. Once that choice is made, players may not respond until after the appropriate room ability has triggered.
